title: Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 (No. 50 of 2013) (as adapted by the Housing,
heading: 3. The day appointed as the day (“property vesting day”) on which the
text_raw:
3. The day appointed as the day (“property vesting day”) on which the 
property of the water service authorities referred to in the Schedule stands 
vested in Irish Water is 31 December 2022.
text_norm: 3 day appointed day ( property vesting day ) property water service authority referred schedule stand vested irish water 31 december 2022

title: Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013 (No. 50 of 2013) (as adapted by the Housing,
heading: 4. On the property vesting day the following property, which immediately
text_raw:
4. On the property vesting day the following property, which immediately 
before that day was vested in a water services authority referred to in column 
(1) of the Schedule, shall stand vested in Irish Water, namely — 

(a) 

all water mains and sewers (other than storm water sewers) and 
any related accessories, and 

(b) 

all pipes, along with any related accessories, 

that connect directly to the public water and waste water infrastructure and that 
are located under the open public areas and roads (not including private 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 20th December, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 driveways) of a housing estate within the attendant grounds of the housing 
estates listed in column (2) at the address mentioned opposite in column (3) of 
the Schedule.

text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation). 

This Statutory Instrument gives effect to the decision of the Minister for 
Housing, Local Government and Heritage to transfer the underground assets 
(water mains, sewers, pipes and works located under land) pertaining to the 
properties listed in column (2) of the schedule to the Order from each water 
services authority, referred to in column (1) of the schedule, to Irish Water in 
accordance with section 12 of the Water Services (No. 2) Act 2013.
